description: From solution to a difference equation.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. R. J. Asveld, A family of Fibonacci-like sequences, Fib. Quart., 25 (1987), 81-83.
formula: Numbers so far satisfy a(n) = A000557(n) - 1. - _Ralf Stephan_, May 23 2004
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
